entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 a.m. ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 9.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 4:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 15 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: ESE 43 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 3 except minus 1 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the evening then clear. Fog patches developing late in the evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3 except minus 1 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 14 except 8 along parts of the coast. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
